entry.name: gapTop
entry.label: Size of the gap between a window and the top screen edge

entry.name: gapLeft
entry.label: Size of the gap between a window and the left screen edge

entry.name: gapMid
entry.label: Size of the gap between adjacent windows

entry.name: gapRight
entry.label: Size of the gap between a window and the right screen edge

entry.name: gapBottom
entry.label: Size of the gap between a window and the bottom screen edge

entry.name: panelTop
entry.label: Floating panel at the top screen edge

entry.name: panelLeft
entry.label: Floating panel at the left screen edge

entry.name: panelMid
entry.label: Size of the panel between adjacent windows

entry.name: panelRight
entry.label: Floating panel at the right screen edge

entry.name: panelBottom
entry.label: Floating panel at the bottom screen edge

entry.name: excludeMode
entry.label: Whether to gap all except the specified applications

entry.name: includeMode
entry.label: Whether to gap no except the specified applications

entry.name: applications
entry.label: List of applications to be excluded or included
